医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究人员开发了新工具来评估食道疾病的心理影响与客观评估相比，心理因素对食管疾病中症状的严重程度具有更大的影响，例如胃酸反流和食管运动功能。尽管有调查表评估日本的一般心理状态，但没有针对食管症状的特定问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-develop-new-toovel-new-tool-to-sasses-psychological-spychological-impact-octact-octact-osophaceal-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/researchers-develop-new-toovel-new-tool-to-sesses-psychological-spsychological-impact-octact-octact-ospophaceal-yapogeal-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3105D69-D621-40DA-BB36-2CAA1793C5 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 01:25:18 -0500 Researchers develop new tool to assess psychological impact of esophageal diseases
UCL的研究人员开发了开创性疗法，以引起高血压的常见原因UCL，伦敦皇后大学和Barts Health的研究人员已经开发了一种微创疗法，该疗法有可能改变高血压常见原因的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/ucl-researchers-develop-develop--ground-therapy-theraphy-therapy-for-a-common-common cause-cause of-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/ucl-researchers-develop-develop--ground-theraphing-theraphy-therapy-for-a-common-common comause-cose-cause-cause of-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-ligh-pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=042815d5-a915-4da1-93d9-6c5685ca5064 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 01:20:36 -0500 UCL researchers develop groundbreaking therapy for a common cause of high blood pressure
个性化的家庭访问大大减少了脆弱的老年人的住院一项旨在支持开始变得脆弱的老年人的新服务，可以将紧急住院的入院减少超过三分之一，并节省NHS资金，并找到了由UCL研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/personalized-home-visits-siminficity---降低了hospital-admissions-admissions-for-gorder-gorder-apults-with-frailty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/Personalized-home-visits-significantly-reduce-hospital-admissions-for-older-adults-with-frailty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a347901-e440-440-480f-a7775-f461d31de9ac Tue, 25 Feb 2025 00:59:54 -0500 Personalized home visits significantly reduce hospital admissions for older adults with frailty
研究探讨了抗抑郁药的使用与痴呆症患者认知能力下降之间的联系新的研究表明，抗抑郁药可以加速痴呆症患者的认知能力下降。同时，根据BMC医学上发表的研究，一些药物似乎不如其他药物有害，可以帮助医生做出更好的治疗决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/study-explores-link-between--new-between--antide-pressant-isepressant-use-and-cognitive-ned--sognitive-decline-indementia-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/Study-explores-link-between-antidepressant-use-and-cognitive-decline-in-dementia-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c8b33333c-aede-4ebf-94f-94f8-94f8-94f2b12ad9d0 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 00:51:34 -0500 Study explores link between antidepressant use and cognitive decline in dementia patients
科学家的目标是为BPD过早婴儿再生一项新的研究表明，理解韧性 - 受伤的肺组织愈合和再生的能力 - 可能是促进危及生命的肺部疾病的治疗和预防的关键，而肺部疾病发生在极其早产的婴儿中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/scientists-aim-to-regenase-lungs-for-for-premature-infants-nfants-n-bpd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/scientists-aim-to-to-regenerate-lungs-for-premature-premature-infants-bpd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14947460-91bd-4d34-807a-d3bd99f99fdff23 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 00:34:10 -0500 Scientists aim to regenerate lungs for premature infants with BPD
遗传研究表明使用GLP-1激动剂使用脂肪选择性体重减轻糖尿病和肥胖症已成为全球紧迫的健康问题。胰高血糖素样肽-1（GLP-1）受体激动剂是一种广泛用于治疗2型糖尿病（T2D）的药物，在降低血糖水平和由于其独特的药理作用而有助于体重减轻中都显示出显着的有效性机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/genetic-study-dymstrates-fat-seleception-weight-weight-with-with-with-with-with-with-with-with-with-glp-1-agonist-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250225/genetic-study-dymstrates-fat-selactive-weight-weight-with-with-with-with-glp-1-agonist-sogiS-sapx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f2276b9-212f-46b6b6-9b1b-395bdec7e215 Tue, 25 Feb 2025 00:26:38 -0500 Genetic study demonstrates fat-selective weight loss with GLP-1 agonist use
研究发现有力的证据表明鸟类流感在农场之间的空气中传播研究人员提供了遗传和气象证据，表明HPAI H5N1在8公里以上的风传播是可能的，强调了其在家禽农场爆发中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-strong-vidence-that-bird-flu-spread-spreads-throughs-through-th-the-air-bet-farms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-finds-strong-vidence-tht-bird-flu-spread-spreads-through-th-the-air-bet-the-air-farms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61346e46-e29a-4C4B-9365-AF1FE07914C4 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 23:32:00 -0500 Study finds strong evidence that bird flu spreads through the air between farms
AI生成的食物图像使某些人不安 - 这就是为什么研究人员发现，AI生成的食物图像，尤其是不完美的食物图像，引起了不可思议的山谷效应，使它们显得令人毛骨悚然且不愉快，尤其是在食物新恐惧症的人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/ai-generated-food-images-make-make-some-people-uneasye28094 heree28099S-Why.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/ai-generated-food-images-images-make-some-some-people-uneasye28094 heree28099s-why.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1944dba8-c723-4d1E-91E-91E7-9B91967D4BCA Mon, 24 Feb 2025 23:09:00 -0500 AI-generated food images make some people uneasy—here’s why
研究挑战BRCA1突变在前列腺癌开始中的作用如前所述，BRCA1基因的突变要么是遗传（种系）或获得（躯体）的（躯体）可能不是开始前列腺癌的关键，这表明，同类的首次研究，在线发表在Open Access Journal BMJ肿瘤学上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-challenges-role-of-brca1-moint-in-prostate-cancer-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/study-challenges-role-of-brca1-moint-in-rostate-cancer-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9606d311-dfb1-4554-A235-60113B53E544 Mon, 24 Feb 2025 21:00:12 -0500 Study challenges role of BRCA1 mutation in prostate cancer initiation
熊，推迟和蠕虫可以教会我们生存的深空？科学家们正在探索动物模型（射精，极端刺激者和小生物）如何使用AI驱动的监控来抵消长期空间旅行的健康风险，从而将这些发现转化为宇航员解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/what what-c​​an-bears-tardigrades-and-worms-teach-us-us-about-surviving-surviving-deep-space.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250224/what what-c​​an-bears-tardigrades-and-worms-and-worms-teach-us-about-about-surviving-surviving-space-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4E517B13-F380-44DC-9207-8B6E66686846C Mon, 24 Feb 2025 20:57:00 -0500 What can bears, tardigrades, and worms teach us about surviving deep space?
